title: Guardian of the Sands Skarner Sound Bug
body: I have my master volume at 100%. I lowered all of my individual sounds to be 50% or lower (depending on game importance) because I like to listen to music and play sometimes. I've played against a Guardian of the Sands Skarner in Poro King twice now. Whenever anyone goes to capture one of his crystal spires, the sound effect overrides both the voice effects and sound effects (which are set at 5% and 10% respectively) and seems to sound at 100%. It's not annoying so much as it is distracting and painful to my sensitive ears; I was totally caught off guard the first time I heard it.

replies.body:
Hello LatinBsnDude,

Fantastic catch, took me and the SFX guy that works on this a bit to find the problem but we were able to find the issue!
This will not be in 6.1 but if all goes well we will have it out as soon as we can. Thank you very much for setting up all the 
things you did to find this bug. From the volume levels to the skin and what map. This helps us so much by saving us time
and also pinpointing the issue. 

You are an awesome dude :D


Ranger XIV
